name: Lemony Shrimp Skewers
description: Say hello to summer with these delicious skewers, bursting with fresh, citrus flavours! Shrimp are a low-calorie and low-fat protein, so they’re a great choice for weight management.

ingredients.name: frozen, peeled, raw jumbo shrimp, thawed
chopped cilantro, squeeze of lemon juice

preparation:
1. Preheat grill to medium high heat. Lightly brush with oil. 
  2. Chop peppers, zucchini, and onion into 1–2" pieces and place in a large bowl. Add shrimp, seasoning, and oil; toss to coat. Thread veggies and shrimp onto Grill Boss Skewers.   
  3. Grill skewers 2–3 min per side, or until shrimp are bright pink and veggies are tender. Serve with toppings, if desired.
tips:
Swap shrimp for 1 lb (450 g) chicken breast filets or cubed firm tofu.

Swap 2 tbsp Lemon Pepper Seasoning for Lemon Garlic Chicken Seasoning.
